question: I am in the U.S. on a Visa and don’t qualify for Medical Assistance coverage because of my visa status.  Will my premiums for private health insurance go down?
text:
I am in the U.S. on a Visa and dont qualify for Medical Assistance coverage because of my visa status.  Will my premiums for private health insurance go down?
          
        
If you are in the U.S. on a Visa, you may qualify for coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.  Depending on your income, you may qualify for significant financial assistance.
